00049 void VhdlSignal::write( QTextStream& stream ) const {
00050         Q_ASSERT(!name_.isEmpty());
00051         Q_ASSERT(!type_.isEmpty());
00052 
00053         if (!description_.isEmpty()) {
00054                 stream << "\t";
00055                 VhdlGeneral::writeDescription(description_, stream, QString("\t"));
00056         }
00057         stream << "\tsignal " << name_ << " : ";
00058 
00059         QString typeDefinition = VhdlGeneral::vhdlType2String(type_, left_, right_);
00060 
00061         stream << typeDefinition << ";" << endl;
00062 }
